TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GrammarBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供机制以便以编程方式为语音识别语法生成约束。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for programmatically building the constraints for a speech recognition grammar.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过从其他类隐式转换或通过组合，还可以获取此类的实例对象是否与从新到第二个对象。Instances of this class can also be obtained by implicit conversions from other classes or by combining a object with a second object to from a new . 有关详细信息，请参阅和方法。For more information, see the and methods. 若要将约束添加到现有，使用， ， ， ，并且方法，和运算符。To add constraints to an existing , use the , , , , and methods, and the operator. > [!IMPORTANT] > 语音识别器可以使用语音识别语法，其中包含具有相同的密钥名称的重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素时引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)并[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态方法提供了另一种机制可以组合使用各种类型创建多样性和灵活性在语法中的使用生成。The static methods provide another mechanism by which you can combine various types to create diversity and flexibility in grammars built with . 这些方法对应于静态方法，也需要定义类。These methods correspond to the static methods, which are also defined on the class. 参数的顺序确定在新元素的顺序。The order of the parameters determines the order of the elements in the new . 一个还可以从获取， ， ，并[字符串](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733)对象。A can also be obtained from , , , and [String](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=159733) objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅和运算符。For more information, see the and operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 语音识别器可以使用语音识别语法，其中包含具有相同的密钥名称的重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素时引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)并[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持从以下类隐式转换： supports implicit conversions from the following classes: - - - - 此方法接受为上面列出的对象`builder`参数。This method accepts the objects listed above for the `builder` parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅和运算符。For more information, see the and operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 结合并包含的对象或实例，请确保避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以重复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素属性的对象。When you combine and objects that contain or instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the property of a object. 如果遇到这种情况下，语音识别器可以引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[GrammarBuilder 语法添加语义](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh361581.aspx)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Add Semantics to a GrammarBuilder Grammar](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh361581.aspx).

span.span: Appends a grammar element to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用这些方法来为语法元素追加到现有。Use these methods to append grammar elements to an existing . 创建为语法元素时，可以将它们追加到现有的生成器渐进式开发语音识别语法的约束。As you create grammar elements, you can append them to the existing builder to progressively develop the constraints for a speech recognition grammar. 每个元素添加到当前元素的序列的末尾。Each element is added to the end of the current sequence of elements. 此方法具有重载，以便追加， ， ， ，和对象。This method has overloads for appending , , , , and objects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 语音识别器可以使用语音识别语法，其中包含具有相同的密钥名称的重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素时引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)并[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

span.span: The maximum number of times that input matching phrase can occur to constitute a match.

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法文件或语法规则。

span.span: Appends a grammar file or a grammar rule to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以追加语法文件的语法规则。The methods can append a grammar file or a grammar rule from a file. 这些方法允许的应用程序能够使用的预先部署或公开提供的语法规则。These methods allow applications to make use of pre-deployed or publicly available grammar rules. 应用程序必须具有读取访问权限指定的语法文件的位置。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. 这些方法可从以下格式读取语音识别语法。These methods can read a speech recognition grammar from the following formats. - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 符合 Microsoft 语音识别语法二进制格式 （.cfg 文件扩展名） 的二进制文件Binary files that conform to the Microsoft Speech Recognition Grammar Binary Format (.cfg file extension) 编译 XML 格式 SRGS 语法文件到二进制语法文件使用.cfg 扩展可以减少时使用的搜索匹配项，尤其是在语法需要大量的单词和短语的识别。Compiling an XML-format SRGS grammar file to a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension can reduce the time consumed by searches for a match, especially if the grammar requires recognition of a large number of words and phrases. 有关编译为 CFG 的二进制格式 SRGS 语法的信息，请参阅。For information about compiling SRGS grammars to the CFG binary format, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendRuleReference (string path);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendRuleReference(string path) cil managed
Public Sub AppendRuleReference (path As String)
public: void AppendRuleReference(System::String ^ path);
member this.AppendRuleReference : string -> unit

param.name: path
param.span: 在一个支持的布局描述语音识别语法的路径通用资源标识符（URI）的文件。

span.span: The path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加语法定义文件。

span.span: Appends a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供的 URI`path`参数可能为本地或远程。The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote. 应用程序必须具有读取访问权限指定的语法文件的位置。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. W3C 语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 表示形式可以定义根规则。A W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) representation can define a root rule. 此方法追加语法，开始使用其根规则时，为语法元素的当前顺序。This method appends the grammar, beginning with its root rule, to the current sequence of grammar elements. 若要将追加指定的语法规则，请使用方法。To append a specific grammar rule, use the method. ## Examples 下面的 C# 示例创建名为的规则使用语音识别语法`Cities`在本地 SRGS 文件中，cities.grxml。The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml. Cities.grxml 文件的内容如下所示的 C# 代码示例。The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateCitiesGrammar1() { GrammarBuilder builder = new GrammarBuilder(); builder.AppendRuleReference("file://c:/temp/cities.grxml"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(builder); citiesGrammar.Name = "Cities Grammar 1"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

Public Sub AppendRuleReference (path As String, rule As String)
public: void AppendRuleReference(System::String ^ path, System::String ^ rule);
member this.AppendRuleReference : string * string -> unit

param.name: path
param.span: 在一个支持的布局描述语音识别语法的路径通用资源标识符（URI）的文件路径。

span.span: The file path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.

param.name: rule
param.span: 规则的追加、或追加语法文件的默认根规则的标识符 。

span.span: The identifier of the rule to append, or to append the default root rule of the grammar file.

summary.span: 为语法元素的当前顺序追加指定的语法定义文件规则。

span.span: Appends the specified rule of a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供的 URI`path`参数可能为本地或远程。The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote. 应用程序必须具有读取访问权限指定的语法文件的位置。The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files. 可以使用使用方法追加语法文件会开始其根规则。You can use the use the method to append a grammar file beginning with its root rule. ## Examples 下面的 C# 示例创建名为的规则使用语音识别语法`Cities`在本地 SRGS 文件中，cities.grxml。The following C# example creates a speech recognition grammar that uses the rule named `Cities` in a local SRGS file, cities.grxml. Cities.grxml 文件的内容如下所示的 C# 代码示例。The content of the cities.grxml file appears below the C# code example. ```csharp private static Grammar CreateCitiesGrammar2() { GrammarBuilder builder = new GrammarBuilder(); builder.Append("Does"); builder.AppendRuleReference(@"c:\temp\cities.grxml", "Cities"); builder.Append("have a shuttle"); Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(builder); citiesGrammar.Name = "Cities Grammar 2"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

summary.span: 创建对应于两个语法元素序列的新 。

span.span: Creates a new that corresponds to a sequence of two grammar elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在新的顺序的操作数确定元素的顺序。The order of the operands determines the order of the elements in the new . > [!IMPORTANT] > 合并时建议谨慎或包含的对象或实例与其他语法元素。Caution is recommended when combining or objects that contain or instances with other grammar elements. 语音识别器可以使用语音识别语法，其中包含具有相同的密钥名称的重复语义元素或多个可以反复修改相同的语义元素的值的语义元素时引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[使用 SemanticResultKey 和 SemanticResultValue 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 有关生成和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)并[创建 GrammarBuilder 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)。For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持从以下类的转换。 supports conversions from the following classes. - - - - 此方法接受为上面列出的对象`builder`参数。This method accepts the objects listed above for the `builder` parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅运算符。For more information, see the operators. > [!IMPORTANT] > 结合并包含的对象或实例，请确保避免使用同一密钥名称或多个可以重复修改的语义元素创建重复的语义元素属性的对象。When you combine and objects that contain or instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the property of a object. 如果遇到这种情况下，语音识别器可以引发异常。The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances. 有关生成包含语义信息的语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[了解 SemanticResultValue 和 SemanticResultKey 对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c)。For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c). 此运算符的等效方法是 The equivalent method for this operator is
